title: I Get Kicked Out Of Champ Selec And It Says I Left??
body: I entered a draft pick game and it was my turn to pick a champ. So I clicked on Yasuo and just waited while my timer ran down as i was rushing to see if their mid was my counter. I left it at that and when the timer ran out, I got kicked out and it says I left champion select? It's annoying cause its happened three times before and I now have to wait 15 mins. Any ideas as to why this happened??

replies.body: Sorry that happened.  :(  It sounds like your connection lost sync and left you behind.  I recommend going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection to our services, and get in game.  Test it in a custom game first, though!
